author: Jeremy B. White
title: Coronavirus clampdown: The virus casts a shroud over American civic life
description: State and local governments are holding remote meetings, canceling hearings and delaying record disclosures because of the pandemic.
content:
A man wears a mask to protect himself from the coronavirus while running in front of the San Francisco-Oakland Bay Bridge. | AP Photo
SAN FRANCISCO States and cities across the country are cutting off access to open records and canceling in-person meetings, … [+9762 chars]
